pages.text: $(bgreen)Kernel Pult$() is the eldest of the Pult brothers. Of the three of them, Kernel is the only one who consistently remembers the others' birthdays. He bugs them about it a little, too.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)100$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Fast$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)range attack$() plant that 90% throws $(bred)one kernel$() and 10% throws $(bred)one butter$() that can stun enemy every 3 seconds to attack enemy.
$(bgreen)Plant Food :$() It will throw $(bred)powered butter$() to $(l)all surrounding enemies$().
